module: Module-level comment: The RAM_speech_125 module is a single-port RAM for Cyclone IV GX FPGAs, utilizing the altsyncram component. It handles 8-bit address and 32-bit data inputs, synchronized by a clock signal with controls for read and write operations. The module outputs data stored at specified addresses upon read enable. The altsyncram is configured not to allow runtime modifications and is pre-set with RAM_speech_125.mif for initial data values, ensuring compliance with the design specifics of the intended FPGA environment.
